general.gigTitle: develop a wordpress business or ecommerce website in 3 days

sellerCard.oneLiner: Client satisfaction is my main objective
sellerCard.description: Hi! I'm Nur, a certified Front-End Developer from Bangladesh with expertise in crafting user-friendly and high-performing websites. I specialize in Landing Page Design, Business Website Design, E-commerce Website Design, and more.  Leveraging HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I can build responsive websites that convert visitors into leads and boost your online presence. I also offer PSD to WordPress and PSD to Bootstrap conversion, website migration, and website optimization services.  Client satisfaction is my top priority. Let's discuss your project! Contact me today for a free quote.

description.content:
Are you seeking a professional WordPress business website to boost your growth?


I can help you create a beautiful, responsive, user-friendly webpage to impress your customers and boost your sales.


Hi! I'm Nur, a certified front-end and WordPress developer with over five years of experience. I've assisted hundreds of businesses in crafting successful websites, and my expertise spans theme customization, plugin integration, e-commerce setup, and SEO optimization.


I will work with you to understand your business goals and create a website that meets your needs. I will also provide you with ongoing support so that you can make changes to your website as your business grows.


Here are some of the services I offer:

  • Custom WordPress theme design and development
  • WordPress plugin integration
  • Content creation
  • Maintenance and support


Why choose me?

  • Affordable and reliable.
  • 450+ orders completed on Fiverr.
  • Prompt & Professional Responses.
  • Unlimited lifetime support for bug fixes.
  • Tutorials on how to manage your site.


Get started on your custom WordPress business or e-commerce website today!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I contact you before placing the order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Of course, you can contact me before placing the order. I will highly encourage you to do so as it clears any doubt which you have in your mind. I will try to reply to you immediately so that you don't have to wait.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I see your portfolio?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I have worked on various projects and I will be glad to showcase you my work. Kindly drop me a message and I will share my portfolio with you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will need your domain and hosting login details with all necessary content (Text and images ) what you need to be on the website and if you do not have any content I can put the demo text and images and we can update it later when you will have it.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you provide maintenance?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I will provide free maintenance for my work.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you update my existing website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can update your existing website. I suggest that you contact me first so that we can have a clear understanding of the work and price.

packageList.title: Simple Package
packageList.description: Business website of 3 pages (home, about us, contact us) fully responsive and content upload.

milestones.title: Planning
milestones.description: I'll use your provided requirements to start planning your website.

steps.title: Requirements
steps.description: We'll make sure I have everything needed to complete your project.

milestones.title: Website Design
milestones.description: I'll create the design for your website.

steps.title: Design Concept
steps.description: I'll design a concept for your website.

milestones.title: Development
milestones.description: I'll develop the website and deliver a working product for your review.

steps.title: Final Design
steps.description: I'll deliver the final website design for your approval.

milestones.title: Content & Delivery
milestones.description: I'll complete the website for delivery.

steps.title: Content Upload
steps.description: I'll upload your content (copy, images, videos, etc.) to your website.

steps.title: Delivery
steps.description: I'll send you the final delivery for review and feedback.

reviews.comment: Nur is the person to book a gig with if you want top tier service and communication. Book him and you will be happy you did.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much, Steve! 🙏 I truly appreciate your kind words and continued trust. It’s always a pleasure working with you, and I’m glad I can deliver the quality you’re looking for. Looking forward to more great projects ahead!

reviews.comment: Always a pleasure working with this seller. he got right on the website adjustments I needed made and ensured things were exactly how I wanted them within a few hours time. He is always very quick and consistent with his work!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much, Alice! It's always a pleasure working with you as well. I truly appreciate your clear instructions and trust in my work. Looking forward to our next project!

reviews.comment: Nur did an EXCEPTIONAL job on my website development project, delivering a bug-free experience with detailed documentation. His proactive communication and deep understanding ensured the project was completed on time without a hitch. Working with him is always a breeze.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much, Steve! 🙏 I truly appreciate your kind words and the trust you place in my work. It’s always a pleasure collaborating with you, and I’m glad I could deliver exactly what you needed. Looking forward to more successful projects together! 🚀

reviews.comment: I am a repeat customer for a reason. Nur is your guy. Book his gig today. You will be glad you did.

seller_response.comment: Thank you, Steve! 🙌 I truly appreciate your trust and continued support. It’s always a pleasure working with you, and I look forward to many more great projects ahead!

reviews.comment: Nur delivered a highly professional website with attention to detail. He was very responsiveness, cooperative, and went above and beyond throughout the project—truly a pleasure to work with!

seller_response.comment: Thank you, Michael, for such thoughtful feedback! It was a pleasure working on your website for A Paw's Plan. Your clear communication and collaborative approach made the process seamless. I'm glad you’re happy with the results and look forward to future collaborations!
